attributes.action: bring back Charlotte Green and Harriet Cass to The BBc
attributes.additional_details:
Charlotte Green and Harriet Cass have for over many years been announcers for BBC radio 4.
They have accepted voluntary redundancy but I along with many people would like them to stay and bring light and joy to our mornings.
As the BBC is a public entity let us lure them out of redundancy I am sure they don't want to go really!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC.
